pageContext.claim: “[Mueller's team] ruined people. They destroyed -- they destroyed people, good people.”
pageContext.analysis: The president has regularly claimed that the Russia investigation was “a witch hunt.” There’s not, however, any evidence to support that. Several people close to the Trump campaign and administration were charged and have pleaded guilty in connection with the investigation. None of these charges or plea deals have been thrown out. So, Mueller’s team didn’t “destroy” them or “ruin” their lives, so much as they did what prosecutors do — charge people with crimes when they believe crimes have been committed.
